Constructor Detail

BindingInterface

public BindingInterface(PolyPeptide proteinA,
                        PolyPeptide proteinB,
                        Naccess naccess)
Constructor to calculate the amino acids at the binding interface between two protein structures.

Parameters:
proteinA - First protein of two to which interface is to be calculated.
proteinB - Second protein of two to which interface is to be calculated.
naccess - Naccess object to extract SASA for a protein complex and its components.
Method Detail

getInterface

public final java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<AminoAcid>> getInterface()
Returns the binding interface between protein1 and protein2.

Returns:
List of AminoAcid objects that are found at the interface of the dimer.

getBSA

public final double getBSA()
Returns the buried buried surface area at this interface.

Returns:
double value representing the buried surface area.
